mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, B.* FROM ( SELECT m.member_no, m.member_name, m.member_phone , s.sroom_no, s.sroom_name , r.reserve_no, r.reserve_date, r.reserve_people FROM reservation R JOIN member M ON R.member_no = M.member_no JOIN studyroom S ON R.sroom_no = S.sroom_no ORDER BY reserve_no DESC ) B ) Reservation
SELECT S.*, M.*, R.* FROM studyroom S, member M, reservation R WHERE S.sroom_no = R.sroom_no AND R.member_no = M.member_no AND sroom_name LIKE '%'|| #{keyword }|| '%'
SELECT R.*, M.*, S.* FROM reservation R, member M, studyroom S WHERE R.reserve_no = #{reserveNo } AND R.member_no = M.member_no AND R.sroom_no = S.sroom_no
SELECT R.*, M.*, S.* FROM reservation R, member M, studyroom S WHERE R.member_no = M.member_no AND R.sroom_no = S.sroom_no AND rownum <= 5 ORDER BY reserve_no DESC
